text: Howard Thomas Sheppeard (born 31 January 1933) was a Welsh professional footballer who played as an inside forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:People from Ynysybwl Category:Welsh footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Cardiff City F.C. players Category:Newport County A.F.C. players Category:Abergavenny Thursdays F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Living people
title: Howard Sheppeard
